title: HUGE Tobin trade cards for sale
author: Bugsy

posts.post_title: HUGE Tobin trade cards for sale
posts.post_content:
These are LARGE 1880s baseball trade cards that measure approximately 4" x 7".  These cards look very similar to a couple of different 1880s trade card sets made by Tobin Lithographs.  This set is not cataloged (except probably in the Keetz book).  There are only 4 cards in the set.  These are extremely rare.  I have only seen one or two examples of each in the past 20 years.  

LAST ONE: "A Home Run" is clean and crease-free, but has some slight scuffing at the top border and there is some paper loss on back.

Looking for $175 shipped each.  The 6x8 case is included with the card.

Thanks.

Chris
[url]staindsox@hotmail.com[/url]

Breaking the lot.  Oh What a Snap is sold.  Will sell the others for $195 shipped each.

Thanks.

Chris

One left.  Would sell "A Home Run" for $175.

Thanks.

Chris
